analyzed: jāti nirākṛti

jāgartu yaḥ hita sukhāya sa mañju nāthaḥ

hriyam vihāya likhyante vāda sthānāni kānicid
tatra tāvat ādau jāti vādaḥ eva nirākriyate

original: iha yadvastuno bhedābhedābhyāmabhidheyaṃ na bhavati tadvastu na bhavati |
analyzed: iha yat vastunaḥ bheda abhedābhyām abhidheyam na bhavati tat vastu na bhavati
yathā vyoma kamalam
na ca vastunaḥ bheda abhedābhyām abhidheyam sāmānyam iti
vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ
na tāvat ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: na hi vyaktibhyo bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ śakyamabhidhātum |
analyzed: na hi vyaktibhyaḥ bhinnam abhinnam vā sāmānyam śakyam abhidhātum
ubhayathā api a sāmānya ātma tā svabhāva prasaṅgāt

original: tathā hi yadi tāvadvyaktibhyo'rthāntarameva sāmānyābhimataṃ vastu tadā kathaṃ tattāsāṃ sāmānyaṃ nāma |
analyzed: tathā hi yadi tāvat vyaktibhyaḥ ṛtha antaram eva sāmānya abhimatam vastu tadā katham tat tāsām sāmānyam nāma

original: yat khalu yato'rthāntaraṃ na tattasya sāmānyam |
analyzed: yat khalu yatas ṛtha antaram na tat tasya sāmānyam
yathā goḥ aśvaḥ
artha antaram ca goḥ go tvam iti
viruddha vyāpta upalambhaḥ

original: nanu ca vyaktibhyo'rthāntaraṃ ca syāt sāmānyaṃ ca tāsāmiti |
analyzed: nanu ca vyaktibhyaḥ ṛtha antaram ca syāt sāmānyam ca tāsām iti
na virodham iha paśyāmaḥ
na ca etat mantavyam

original: arthāntaraṃ cedarthāntarasya sāmānyaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasya sāmānyaṃ syādviśeṣābhāvāditi |
analyzed: artha antaram ced artha antarasya sāmānyam sarvam sarvasya sāmānyam syāt viśeṣa abhāvāt iti

original: yaddhi khalvekaṃ vastvanekatra samavetaṃ tattadīyaṃ sāmānyam |
analyzed: yat hi khalu ekam vastu an ekatra samavetam tat tadīyam sāmānyam

original: goṣu cāśvo na samaveta iti kathamasau gavāṃ sāmānyaṃ syāditi kuto viśeṣābhāvaḥ |
analyzed: goṣu ca aśvaḥ na samavetaḥ iti katham asau gavām sāmānyam syāt iti kutas viśeṣa abhāvaḥ
tat ayam anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ katham iṣṭa siddhaye paryāpnuyāt
tat etat api bāla pralāpam anuharati

original: sa hi viśeṣo buddhimatā vaktavyo yaḥ sāmānyābhimatapadārthamātrabhāvī sannasaṃkareṇa vyavasthāmupapādayet |
analyzed: sa hi viśeṣaḥ buddhimatā vaktavyaḥ yaḥ sāmānya abhimata padārtha mātra bhāvī san asaṃkareṇa vyavasthām upapādayet

original: ayaṃ cānekārthasamavāyaḥ saṃkhyāsaṃyogakāyadravyādiṣvapyastīti tānyapi sāṃkhyādisaṃmatāni sāmānyāni syuḥ |
analyzed: ayam ca aneka artha samavāyaḥ saṃkhyā saṃyoga kāya dravya ādiṣu api asti iti tāni api sāṃkhya ādi saṃmatāni sāmānyāni syuḥ
atha evam manyethāḥ

original: satyapyanekārthasamavāye yadeva samānajñānābhidhānapravṛttinimittaṃ tadeva sāmānyaṃ nānyat |
analyzed: sati api aneka artha samavāye yat eva samāna jñāna abhidhāna pravṛtti nimittam tat eva sāmānyam na anyat
samānānām hi bhāvaḥ sāmānyam
bhavataḥ usmāt abhidhāna pratyayau iti bhāvaḥ
tat āha
etat api sva prakriyā mātra pradīpanam
tathā hi atra vikalpa dvayam udayate
kim te sva rūpeṇa samānāḥ
tat sāmānyam tathāvidha bodha abhidhāna pravaṇam
āhosvit asamānāḥ eva iti

original: tatra yadi te svata eva samānāḥ saṃmāne jñānābhidhāna .....( )
analyzed: tatra yadi te svatas eva samānāḥ saṃmāne jñāna abhidhāna
mā iva pravartayiṣyanti
kim tatra sāmānyena artha antareṇa
tathā ca tat asāmānyam eva
tad balena samānayoḥ jñāna abhidhānayoḥ apravṛtteḥ
atha samānāḥ

original: na tarhiī teṣāṃ sāmānyamasti samānānāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānyamityuktavānasi |
analyzed: na tarhi ī teṣām sāmānyam asti samānānām bhāvaḥ sāmānyam iti uktavān asi

original: asamānāṃ ca bhāvaḥ sāmānyamiti bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃpriyaḥ |
analyzed: asamānām ca bhāvaḥ sāmānyam iti bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīya prajñaḥ devānām priyaḥ

original: svayamasamānasvabhāvā api te naiva samānāsta iti cet |
analyzed: svayam asamāna svabhāvāḥ api te na eva samānāḥ te iti ced
kim te kriyante
atha adhyavasīyante
tatra na tāvat kriyante
teṣām sva hetubhiḥ eva kṛta tvāt
kṛtasya ca punar karaṇa ayogāt
abhūta prādurbhāva lakṣaṇa tvāt karaṇasya samāna ātmanā kriyante iti ced

original: nanu yaiṣāṃ niṣpannatayā kṛñaḥ karmatā nāsti kathaṃ te kriyante nāma |
analyzed: nanu yā eṣām niṣpanna tayā kṛñaḥ karma tā na asti katham te kriyante nāma

original: syādetat, yena dharmirūpeṇa te niṣpannā na tena karoteḥ karmabhāvamanubhavanti |
analyzed: syāt etat yena dharmi rūpeṇa te niṣpannāḥ na tena karoteḥ karma bhāvam anubhavanti

original: samānena punā rūpeṇa [ 3 a ] niṣpannāstena kriyanta iti na kiṃcidatrānupapannam |
analyzed: samānena punar rūpeṇa a niṣpannāḥ tena kriyante iti na kiṃcid atra anupapannam

original: evaṃ tarhi tadeva samānaṃ rūpaṃ sāmānyena kiyata iti syāt tasya ca bhāvaniṣpattāvaniṣpannasya kāraṇāntarataḥ paśvādupajāyamānasya tadbhāvatā  #
analyzed: evam tarhi tat eva samānam rūpam sāmānyena kiyataḥ iti syāt tasya ca bhāva niṣpattau aniṣpannasya kāraṇa antarataḥ paśvāt upajāyamānasya tad bhāva tā  /
brahmaṇā api aśaktā sādhayitum
artha antaram eva tat bhavatu
na kiṃcid aniṣṭam āpadyate iti ced
sāmānya antaram eva tarhi tat na iti asāmānya janmam abhyupetam syāt

original: tathā ca tadapi bhedānāmasamānānāṃ kathaṃ sāmānyamiti paryanuyoge tenāpi tadvyatiriktasamānarūpakaraṇopagame satyaparāparakarmasāmānyaparikalpanātmakamanavasthānamapratividhānamāsajyate  #
analyzed: tathā ca tat api bhedānām asamānānām katham sāmānyam iti paryanuyoge tena api tad vyatirikta samāna rūpa karaṇa upagame satya para apara karma sāmānya parikalpanā ātmakam anavasthānam apratividhānam āsajyate  /
na ca bhedānām asamāna rūpam pracyavate
na api dvitīya pakṣa śrayaṇam śreyaḥ

original: na hyanyenānye samānā nāma pratīyante tadvanto nāma pratīyeran |
analyzed: na hi anyena anye samānāḥ nāma pratīyante tadvantaḥ nāma pratīyeran
bhūtavat kaṇṭhe guṇena

original: anyathā hi yena kenacidapyanyena ye kecana samānāḥ pratīyeran pratiniyamanibandhanābhāvāt |
analyzed: anyathā hi yena kenacid api anyena ye kecana samānāḥ pratīyeran pratiniyama nibandhana abhāvāt
ekena aneka samavāyena anyena anye samānāḥ pratīyante
tatas na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ced
vārtam etat     na hi avayavi dravya dvi tva ādi saṃkhyānām api eka tva aneka samavāyi tve na staḥ
yena tebhyaḥ avayava ādayaḥ na

original: atha teṣāṃ svāśrayeṣu samānajñānābhidhānasāmarthyābhāvādadoṣa eṣaḥ nanu sāmānyamapi bhedeṣvekatvānekasamavāyābhyāmeva samapratyayahetutayā
analyzed: atha teṣām sva āśrayeṣu samāna jñāna abhidhāna sāmarthya abhāvāt adoṣaḥ eṣaḥ nanu sāmānyam api bhedeṣu eka tva aneka samavāyābhyām eva sama pratyaya hetu tayā

original: tau vā'vayavyādīnāmapi yuṣmābhirabhyupetāviti teṣāmapi tathābhāvaḥ kathamapākiyeta |
analyzed: tau vā avayavi ādīnām api yuṣmābhiḥ abhyupetau iti teṣām api tathābhāvaḥ katham apākiyeta
asāmānya svabhāva tvāt na te samāna jñāna hetavaḥ iti ced
nanu samāna jñāna ahetu tve satya samāna svabhāva tā
tasyām ca satyām samāna jñāna ahetu tvam iti sphuṭam itaretara āśraya tvam

original: tathā hyekatvādeḥ samānatvātsāmānyābhimatabhāvavadārabhya dravyāderapi kiṃ na sāmānyarūpateti paryanuyoge samānapratyayāpratyayatvādityuttaramuktavānasi
analyzed: tathā hi eka tva ādeḥ samāna tvāt sāmānya abhimata bhāva vat ārabhya dravya ādeḥ api kim na sāmānya rūpatā iti paryanuyoge samāna pratyaya apratyaya tvāt iti uttaram uktavān asi

original: tatastadapi samānapratītinimittasya samānatvātsamānamavayavyāderapi kiṃ na syādityasmadīye punaḥ paryanuyoge sanyasāmānyarūpatvāditi bruvāṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas tat api samāna pratīti nimittasya samāna tvāt samānam avayavi ādeḥ api kim na syāt iti asmadīye punar paryanuyoge sani asāmānya rūpa tvāt iti bruvāṇaḥ
na ekam ca brūyāt

original: tasya ca sākṣādekatvanityatve pratijñāya punarupadeśāntareṇa tata eva prativahatīti kathaṃ nonmataḥ |
analyzed: tasya ca sākṣāt ekatva nityatve pratijñāya punar upadeśa antareṇa tatas eva prativahati iti katham nā unmataḥ
tasmāt bheda amedābhyām a
sāmānyam iti siddham
nanu ayam anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ

original: yadyapi hi sāmānyaṃ bhedābhedābhyāṃ kevalābhyāṃ vācyaṃ na tathāpyavastu prakārāntarasyāpyubhayātmanā lakṣaṇasya saṃbhavādbhinnābhinnameva hi  #
analyzed: yadi api hi sāmānyam bheda abhedābhyām kevalābhyām vācyam na tathā api avastu prakāra antarasya api ubhaya ātmanā lakṣaṇasya saṃbhavāt bhinna abhinnam eva hi
sāmānyam jaina jaiminīyāḥ pratijānate yat āhuḥ
ghaṭa mauli suvarṇa arthī nāśa utpāda sthitiṣu ayam
śoka pramoda mādhyasthyam janaḥ yāti sa hetukam
na sāmānya ātmanā udeti na vyeti vyaktam anvayāt
vyetu dā iti viśeṣeṇa saha ekatra udaya ādi sat  /
yathā kalmāṣa varṇasya yathā iṣṭa varṇa vigrahaḥ
citra tvāt vastunā api evam bheda abheda avadhāraṇā
yadā tu śabalam vastu yugavat pratipadyate
tadā anya ananya bheda ādi sarvam eva pratīyate  /
eka ātmakam bhavet ekam iti na īśvara bhāṣitam
tathā hi tat upetavyam yat yathā eva upalabhyate
atra pratividhīyate
bheda abhedayoḥ anyonya pratiṣedha rūpa tvāt eka vidheḥ apara niṣedha nāntarīyaka tvāt katham anayoḥ eka adhikaraṇa tvam matta unmatta itaraḥ pratipadyeta
tathā hi
tat nāma tasmāt abhinnam yat eva yat
bhinnam ca tat tasmāt yat yat na bhavati

original: ataśva vyaktibhyaḥ sāmānyaṃ bhinnamabhinnaṃ ceti bruvāṇo vyaktayaḥ sāmānyaṃ na ca vyaktayaḥ sāmānyamiti brūte |
analyzed: atas vai vyaktibhyaḥ sāmānyam bhinnam abhinnam ca iti bruvāṇaḥ vyaktayaḥ sāmānyam na ca vyaktayaḥ sāmānyam iti brūte
katham ca svastha cetana śvetasi api tat etat āropayet
prayogaḥ

original: yadyadevaṃ na tadatadbhavati yathoṣṇaṃ vahrirūpaṃ nānuṣṇam |
analyzed: yat yat evam na tat a tat bhavati yathā uṣṇam vahri rūpam na an uṣṇam
vyaktayaḥ eva sāmānyam iti svabhāva viruddha upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ
ubhayathā pratīteḥ ubhaya upagamaḥ iti ced
nanu pratītiḥ apratīteḥ bādhikā na tu mithyā pratīteḥ
vitathasya api pratīti darśanāt

original: anyathā hi pratītiyathānusāriṇā bhavatā dvicandrādayo ... ... ... vaśātte nihnūyansa iti cet |
analyzed: anyathā hi pratīti yathā anusāriṇā bhavatā dvi candra ādayaḥ vaśāt te nihnūyan saḥ iti ced
iha api etat anumānam asiddhi ādi doṣatraya rahita liṅga jam kim na paśyati devānām priyaḥ

original: [ 5 a] na saṃvido yuktibhirasti bādheti cet |
analyzed: na saṃvidaḥ yuktibhiḥ asti bādhā iti ced

original: nanu kimiyaṃ rājñāmājñā yenāvicārya gṛhyeta pratyakṣasvabhāvā saṃvit |
analyzed: nanu kim iyam rājñām ājñā yena a vicārya gṛhyeta pratyakṣa svabhāvā saṃvid

original: tacca jyeṣṭhapramāṇamato na bādhyata iti cet |
analyzed: tat ca jyeṣṭha pramāṇam atas na bādhyate iti ced
na tarhi tat anumānam pramāṇam syāt

original: lakṣaṇayukte bādhāsaṃbhave tallakṣaṇameva dūṣitaṃ syāditi sarvatrānāśvāsaḥ |
analyzed: lakṣaṇa yukte bādhā asaṃbhave tad lakṣaṇam eva dūṣitam syāt iti sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ

original: yathānumānābhāso bādhyate pratyakṣābhāso'pi kiṃ na bādhyate |
analyzed: yathā anumāna ābhāsaḥ bādhyate pratyakṣa ābhāsaḥ api kim na bādhyate
bādhya tām adhyakṣa ābhāsaḥ

original: pratyakṣaiva punariyaṃ saṃvittistatkathaṃ na bādhyata iti cet |
analyzed: pratyakṣā eva punar iyam saṃvittiḥ tat katham na bādhyate iti ced
nanu iyam api pratyakṣa ābhāsavān anumānena bādhyamāna tvāt

original: atha pratyakṣameva pratyakṣasya tadābhāsatāṃ bādhyatvātsādhayati na tvanumānamityabhiniveśaḥ |
analyzed: atha pratyakṣam eva pratyakṣasya tad ābhāsa tām bādhya tvāt sādhayati na tu anumānam iti abhiniveśaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi jvālādiviṣayāyāḥ pratyabhijñāyā vyaktyapekṣayā pratyakṣābhāsatā vyavasthāpyate |
analyzed: katham tarhi jvālā ādi viṣayāyāḥ pratyabhijñāyāḥ vyakti apekṣayā pratyakṣa ābhāsa tā vyavasthāpyate
na khalu jvālā ādīnām akṣaṇika tvam adhyakṣam avadhārayet
tasmāt anumānam eva jvālā ādīnām kṣaṇika tām sādhayet
bādhakam etasyāḥ iti akāmakena api kumārilena abhyupetavyam

original: na śakyaṃ vaktuṃ sāmānyameva kevalaṃ tayā viṣayīkriyata iti tathābhāve hi tadevedaṃ buddhijvālātvamiti syāt na tu saiveyaṃ jvāleti |
analyzed: na śakyam vaktum sāmānyam eva kevalam tayā viṣayīkriyate iti tathābhāve hi tat evā idam buddhi jvālā tvam iti syāt na tu sā evā iyam jvālā iti
tasmāt na anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ iti alam bahu bhāṣitayā iti
jāti nirākṛtiḥ iyam jita ari pādānām
